name: Deed Hunt
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left CTRL - Crouch

E - Interact

F - Flashlight(when you get it)

Tip: When you first start the game, about 2-3 steps forward and on the left is the flashlight

"HUD - " zip includes prompts when you are in range to interact with an object, the other zip does not include these and is a smaller size.

This is my very first project making in Unreal Engine. I know there are some issues, such as audio sounds will sometimes play over each other, and the house as a whole is rather empty - I'll probably work to fix these in future updates of the game!

Also, can't believe Unreal Engine 4 doesn't support HTML5 exporting anymore =/

Most of the materials(wall paper/flooring/etc) are from the Unreal Engine Starter Content pack. The images on the walls are screenshots from FFXIV(you can see the copyright notice in the bottom left corner of the images) and the one meme that I posted on reddit once.
